summary.span: 表示權限，會使用實作來判斷是否應授與使用中的主體資源存取權。

span.span: Represents a permission that uses a implementation to determine if access to a resource should be granted to the active principal.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類別提供的功能來執行命令式的存取檢查使用針對應用程式設定。The class provides the capability to perform imperative access checks by using the that is configured for an application. 藉由叫用方法或靜態方法中，您可以提供您的程式碼，根據為您的宣告驗證管理員定義的授權原則的執行路徑內的資源保護。By invoking the method or the static method, you can provide protection to resources from within the execution path of your code according to the authorization policy defined for your claims authentication manager. 宣告式存取可讓您檢查可以藉由執行類別。Declarative access checks can be performed by using the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 類別會使用宣告授權管理員來設定下方設定屬性。The class uses the claims authorization manager configured by the that is set under the property. 這是在所有情況下，甚至是在其中未使用 WS-同盟; 的情況下，則為 true例如，作用中 (WCF) Web 應用程式和主控台應用程式。This is true in all cases, even in scenarios where WS-Federation is not used; for example, active (WCF) Web applications and Console applications. 您可以指定宣告授權管理員在設定或以程式設計的方式。You can specify the claims authorization manager either in configuration or programmatically. 若要指定組態檔中的宣告授權管理員，設定[ <claimsAuthorizationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md)項目底下[ <identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md)項目，並確定這個身分識別組態由參考[ <Federationconfiguration>> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md)由執行階段載入的項目 （例如，藉由設定`identityConfigurationName`屬性)。To specify the claims authorization manager in a configuration file, set the [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md) element under an [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md) element and ensure that this identity configuration is referenced by the [<federationConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md) element that is loaded by the runtime (for example, by setting the `identityConfigurationName` attribute). 若要以程式設計方式設定宣告授權管理員，提供的處理常式事件。To set the claims authorization manager programmatically, provide a handler for the event. 上一個層級所提供的功能類似於以角色為基礎的存取檢查 (RBAC)，透過提供類別; 不過，類別會執行檢查根據提供的作用中主體的宣告。On one level, the functionality provided by is similar to the role-based access checks (RBAC) provided through the class; however, the class performs checks based on the claims presented by the active principal. 這可讓更多資料粒度比透過純 RBAC，其中許多權限通常會收集在一個角色。This enables far more granularity than is available through pure RBAC, where many permissions are typically collected under a single role. 可能是為更重要的是，宣告為基礎的授權，可讓商務邏輯和授權原則的分離因為權限可以要求特定動作的程式碼中的資源，而且後端原則可用來設定哪些宣告呈現實體必須擁有以滿足需求。Perhaps, more importantly, claims-based authorization enables better separation of business logic and authorization policy because permission can be demanded for a specific action on a resource in code and back-end policy can be used to configure which claims the presenting entity must possess in order to satisfy the demand. 例如 RBAC，不同於衍生自的類別所實作的程式碼存取安全性也就是執行以使用者為基礎的存取檢查，類別，並且以確保所有的呼叫端程式碼必須被授與，權限，使用堆疊查核行程其上執行檢查只有目前的主體。Like RBAC, performs a user-based access check, that is, unlike code access security implemented by classes that derive from the class and use a stack walk to ensure that all callers of the code have been granted a permission, performs its check only on the current principal. 靜態方法會檢查指定的動作，對指定資源的存取權。The static method checks access for a specified action on a specified resource. 資源和動作都是字串，並且通常為 Uri。The resource and action are both strings and are typically URIs. 您也可以初始化的執行個體使用動作的資源和呼叫方法。You can also initialize an instance of with an action and a resource and call the method. 建構函式只接受單一資源和動作，雖然物件可以透過結合和方法。Although the constructor only takes a single resource and action, objects can be combined through the and methods. 使用這些方法所建立的權限可能包含多個資源 / 動作配對。A permission created by using these methods may contain multiple resource-action pairs. 這兩種方法會決定存取權限叫用方法搭配已設定的宣告授權管理員使用中的主體所組成 ()、 資源和動作。Both methods determine access by invoking the method of the configured claims authorization manager with an composed of the active principal (), the resource, and the action. 則會擲回如果目前的主體未獲授權執行的動作資源; 否則執行程序。They throw a if the current principal is not authorized to perform the action on the resource; otherwise, execution proceeds. 若是，其中包含多個資源 / 動作配對，的權限中所包含的資源 / 動作配對的每個叫用方法。In the case of a that contains multiple resource-action pairs, the method is invoked for each of the resource-action pairs contained in the permission. 若要呼叫成功，使用中的主體必須經過授權的權限中所包含的資源 / 動作配對的所有。For the call to to succeed, the active principal must be authorized for all of the resource-action pairs contained in the permission. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用來保護資源方法中，方法，或宣告。The following example shows how to protect a resource by using the method, the method, or a declaration. 在每個案例中，已設定會叫用來評估目前的主體，針對指定的資源和動作。In each case, the configured is invoked to evaluate the current principal against the specified resource and action. 如果指定的動作，對指定的資源，未授權目前主體擲回，否則繼續執行。If the current principal is not authorized for the specified action on the specified resource, a is thrown; otherwise, execution proceeds. [!code-csharp[WifCppWithCam#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcppwithcam/cs/wifcppwithcam/program.cs#1)] 下列 XML 說明使用自訂宣告授權所需的最低設定管理員類別。The following XML shows the minimum configuration required to use a custom claims authorization manager with the class. 您必須至少宣告同時`system.identityModel`而`system.identityModel.services`區段中``項目，然後指定您的授權管理員中[ <claimsAuthorizationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md)下的預設身分識別組態項目。You must, at a minimum, declare both the `system.identityModel` and the `system.identityModel.services` sections in the `` element and then specify your authorization manager in a [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md) element under the default identity configuration. 這可確保您的授權管理員從預設的同盟組態參考。This will ensure that your authorization manager is referenced from the default federation configuration. 或者，您可以在其中指定所在中指定授權管理員的身分識別組態的名稱`identityConfigurationName`的屬性[ <Federationconfiguration>> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md)項目。Alternatively, you can specify the name of the identity configuration under which your authorization manager is specified in the `identityConfigurationName` attribute of the [<federationConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md) element. ```xml
```

span.span: <federationConfiguration>

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會初始化使用指定的資源-動作組。The object is initialized with the specified resource-action pair. 您可以呼叫方法，以執行存取檢查。You can call the method to perform an access check. 建構函式只接受單一資源和動作，雖然物件可以透過結合和方法。Although the constructor only takes a single resource and action, objects can be combined through the and methods. 透過這些方法所建立的權限可能包含多個資源 / 動作配對。The permission created through these methods may contain multiple resource-action pairs.

span.span: Checks if the current principal is authorized to perform the specified action on the specified resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在指定的資源上指定的動作進行授權的主體或擲回例外狀況。The principal must be authorized for the specified action on the specified resource or the exception is thrown. 已設定的宣告授權管理員的方法叫用使用中的主體所組成 ()、 資源和動作。The method of the configured claims authorization manager is invoked with an composed of the active principal (), the resource, and the action. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用來保護資源方法。The following example shows how to protect a resource by using the method. 設定的宣告授權管理員會叫用來評估目前的主體，針對指定的資源和動作。The configured claims authorization manager is invoked to evaluate the current principal against the specified resource and action. 如果指定的動作，對指定的資源，未授權目前主體擲回，否則繼續執行。If the current principal is not authorized for the specified action on the specified resource, a is thrown; otherwise, execution proceeds. summary.span: 檢查目前主體是否獲得使用與目前執行個體相關聯之資源/動作配對的授權。

span.span: Checks if the current principal is authorized for the resource-action pairs associated with the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的主體必須獲得所有與這個執行個體相關聯的資源 / 動作配對或擲回例外狀況。The current principal must be authorized for all of the resource-action pairs associated with this instance or the exception is thrown. 建構函式只接受單一資源和動作，雖然物件可以透過結合和方法。Although the constructor only takes a single resource and action, objects can be combined through the and methods. 透過這些方法所建立的權限可能包含多個資源 / 動作配對。The permission created through these methods may contain multiple resource-action pairs. 方法會叫用方法搭配已設定的宣告授權管理員使用中的主體所組成 ()、 資源及包含的資源 / 動作配對的每個動作在 權限。The method invokes the method of the configured claims authorization manager with an composed of the active principal (), the resource, and the action for each of the resource-action pairs contained in the permission. 針對成功使用中的主體必須獲得所有包含的權限中的資源 / 動作配對。For the to succeed the active principal must be authorized for all of the resource-action pairs that are contained in the permission. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用來保護資源方法。The following example shows how to protect a resource by using the method. 設定的宣告授權管理員會叫用來評估目前的主體，針對指定的資源和動作。The configured claims authorization manager is invoked to evaluate the current principal against the specified resource and action. 如果指定的動作，對指定的資源，未授權目前主體擲回，否則繼續執行。If the current principal is not authorized for the specified action on the specified resource, a is thrown; otherwise, execution proceeds. [!code-csharp[WifCppWithCam#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcppwithcam/cs/wifcppwithcam/program.cs#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 權限，則會傳回具有只出現在目前的使用權限和指定的權限的資源 / 動作配對。The permission that is returned has only the resource-action pairs that were present both in the current permission and in the specified permission. 不包含存在於一部或其他的權限的資源 / 動作配對。Resource-action pairs that existed in only one or the other of the permissions are not included. 針對成功上新的權限，目前的主體只需要很常見，目前的使用權限和指定的權限資源 / 動作配對進行授權。For a to succeed on the new permission, the current principal only needs to be authorized for the resource-action pairs that were common to the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的權限會出現在目前的權限資源 / 動作配對的所有而且所有的資源-動作組存在指定的權限。The permission that is returned has all of the resource-action pairs that are present in the current permission and all of the resource-action pairs that are present the specified permission. 針對成功上新的權限，目前的主體必須獲得授權以進行所有存在於目前的權限資源 / 動作配對和所有存在於指定的權限資源 / 動作配對。For a to succeed on the new permission, the current principal must be authorized for all of the resource-action pairs that existed in the current permission and all of the resource-action pairs that existed in the specified permission.
